code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./styles/Profile.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Profile=()=>{const[employee,setEmployee]=useState(null);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{const fetchEmployeeData=async()=>{try{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');if(!token){navigate('/login');return;}const response=await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/employees/me',{headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${token}`}});setEmployee(response.data);}catch(error){var _error$response;console.error('Error fetching employee data:',error);if(((_error$response=error.response)===null||_error$response===void 0?void 0:_error$response.status)===401){navigate('/login');}}};fetchEmployeeData();},[navigate]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Welcome to Your Profile!"}),employee?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Name: ",employee.name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Email: ",employee.email]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Position: ",employee.position]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Salary: ",employee.salary]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Leave Balance: ",employee.leaveBalance]})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading profile information..."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"button-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate('/change'),className:"button",children:"Change Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"back-to-dashboard",onClick:()=>navigate('/employee-dashboard'),children:"Back to Dashboard"})]})]});};export default Profile;
